short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change color of background and rotate background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Through this extension, you can change background color and rotate screen to 360 degree. You can change color which is comfortable to you. And rotate screen for fun with friends.

Any issues, feature requests, bugs reach out to the developer.

https://modapkplanet.com/
